This application obtains book information such as book titles, cover images, and author information from the Google Books API. 

 The barcode scanning feature has been adapted from the ZXing library. 

 The original version of this app was built by Sascha Jaschke, and a modified version was given to students in the Udacity Android Nanodegree program.

 Icons belong to their respective owner and designers.
